BaseListMenu - Class in main.support.menu
Extension of BaseMenu which prioritises the displaying of lists over interaction, this can be used to list out specific objects (using their .toString() method), such as Room objects.

BaseMenu is a class that defines a list of options, and a heading, and acts as the primary interface for the user

Booking - Class in main.models
A booking consists of matching a bookable room and an assistant on shift at a specific time-slot to perform a COVID-19 test on a student.
Booking(int, TimeSlot, Room, Assistant, String) - Constructor for class main.models.Booking
 
BookingApp - Class in main
Starting conditions: 3 rooms 3 assistants 9 bookable room 6 assistants on shift Create bookings such that: The system has at least one booking SCHEDULED and one COMPLETED. The system has at least one bookable room FULL, one AVAILABLE, and one EMPTY. The system has at least one assistant on shift FREE and one BUSY.
